data.eml:eml: A new species of Schindler's fish (Teleostei: Gobiidae: Schindleria) from the Malay Archipelago (Southeast Asia), with notes on the caudal fin complex of Schindleria

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahnelt, Harald, Sauberer, Michael (2018): A new species of Schindler's fish (Teleostei: Gobiidae: Schindleria) from the Malay Archipelago (Southeast Asia), with notes on the caudal fin complex of Schindleria. Zootaxa 4531 (1): 95-108, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.1.4
